text: William Harrison Dixon (6 May 1905 – 23 February 1956) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1956 deaths Category:People from Grimsby Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Middlesbrough F.C. players Category:Craghead United F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Barrow A.F.C. players Category:Boston Town F.C. players Category:Bridlington Town A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Billy Dixon (footballer, born 1905)
